projects.title: Hospital Management
projects.description: The website is designed interactively to provide users with information about the hospital's expertise, experience, and hospitality. Patients can also receive daily updates on their queries and browse through the profiles of the doctors.

projects.title: Attendance Management
projects.description: Streamlining attendance management in any organization involves implementing user-friendly systems, tracking employee punctuality, promoting accountability, ensuring accurate record-keeping, and fostering a culture of attendance awareness to maintain efficiency.

projects.title: Online Crime Management
projects.description: Efficiently managing online crime involves several key components: strong security measures, using AI to detect threats, encouraging teamwork, raising awareness through campaigns, staying ahead of cybercriminals through research and development, and nurturing a cybersecurity culture to provide complete protection.
